name: FIRE & ICE CREAM
description:
You are a steel marble in service to King Aurum.
Light the torches and warm up his castle. Don't anger him.

A challenging sokoban style game where you use heat and cold to your advantage.
I took inspiration from one of Maxis Marble Drop's mechanics and incorporated it into a Sokoban style game.

Made with PuzzleScript, using Draknek's Level Select.
